Description:
The Azure AI Foundry Translator API (Public Preview) enables you to translate text leveraging neural machine translation (NMT) or large language model translation (LLM). In this episode, April shows you how to translate a conversation between an English speaking customer support agent and a French speaking customer, accommodating for both tone and gender.

Try it yourself in Azure AI Foundry and start translating with LLMs: ai.azure.com

Get the code from this episode: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/code

Learn more about the Azure AI Translator API: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/translator-API Configure your Azure AI Foundry resource: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/configure-Azure-resources

Join the Discord: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/discord Hop on Forum: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/forum
